content: NIST Cybersecurity Practice Guide, Special Publication 1800-1: "Securing Electronic Health Records on Mobile Devices" https://www.nccoe.nist.gov/projects/use-cases/health-it/ehr-on-mobile-devices

This is a model configuration of a secured mobile environment. It is not specific to FHIR, but is applicable to typical FHIR deployments. It is given as an example of how experts would configure a mobile environment according to the NIST requirements published in various referenced standards. Thus it is "Informative".
